A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worst Star Wars movie since AoC. I can’t believe Rian Johnson was given the keys to the future of Star Wars. My beloved franchise has been shattered to pieces. The greatest hero in American film history who was fearless and courageous is suddenly fearful? No lightsaber battles??? What the heck. I’m sure it’s a great film in general but a terrible Star Wars film. Say what you want about the prequels but at least they were Star Wars films. Disney I hate you and Kathleen Kennedy you’re a disgrace. There is so much more I want to talk about but whatever man.
